subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning, playing his first game in 20 months after four neck surgeries, completed 19 of 26 passes for 253 yards and two touchdowns as the Broncos beat the Steelers.
snippet: Peyton Manning, playing his first game in 20 months after four neck surgeries, completed 19 of 26 passes for 253 yards and two touchdowns as the Broncos beat the Steelers.
